akas: Tough Love Couples USA (third season title)
Tough Love Miami USA (fourth season title)
Tough Love New Orleans USA (fifth season title)
akas from release info: Tough Love Couples USA (third season title)
Tough Love Miami USA (fourth season title)
Tough Love New Orleans USA (fifth season title)

1.title: Venus and Mars Collide
1.plot: Tough Love is back and this season comes with a twist, Boot camp has gone Co-Ed! Steve Ward, with his sister Monica, takes his in-your-face boot camp to the City of Angels, where he'll transform eight dating misfits into relationship-ready men and women.

2.title: Sister Act
2.plot: It's Girls and Guys night out! The men and women go wild hitting a hot LA nightclub, but little do they know Steve's spying on their every drunken move - along with his sister Monica!

3.title: Mars vs. Venus
3.plot: This week on Tough Love Co-ed, the women confront the men in a battle of wits. Which gender will prove that they know more about how the opposite sex thinks? Later on, things heat when Steve swaps the zapper for the hot seat - literally! The men and women have one-on-one dates while seated on an actual hot seat. Can the men and women of Tough Love impress their dates and the focus groups or are they about to find out just how hot things can get?

4.title: Going Once, Going Twice
4.plot: This week, it's all about verbal skills as our boot campers are put to the test using voice modulators to communicate with their feisty first dates, who will only hear their voices as robotic.

5.title: Bringing Sexy Back
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Secrets and Skirmishes
6.plot: When Steve gives his boot campers free rein to snoop in each other's rooms, the women raid the men's rooms like a pack of bloodhounds while the guys stumble upon items they wish they hadn't.

7.title: Family Issues
7.plot: Break out the tissue for an emotionally wrenching family edition of Tough Love! When Steve has the house write and then read a letter to their parents, the floodgates burst. Before the tears dry, the boot campers are stunned to see their loved ones arrive to confront these issues! Later, Steve turns up the heat on everyone's dates, stressing them to the limit by inviting their date's family along, and injecting each date with organized chaos: wild sprinklers, broken elevators, LA traffic!

8.title: The Exes
8.plot: Steve digs deep into the bootcampers' emotions by introducing voodoo dolls that represent their dead relationships. Little do the girls know that their dating past is coming back to haunt them - literally!

9.title: Hometown Advantage
9.plot: Pack your bags, it's trippin' time! Our guys and gals are bringing their dates back home to take in the sights and meet the folks. The housemates scatter across the country from San Francisco to Atlanta for romantic rendezvous and home-cooked meals courtesy of mom & dad. They embark upon the ultimate test as we see if their budding relationships will flourish with family bonds or wilt with wavering emotions.

10.title: The Finale
10.plot: Steve and Monica say goodbye to another graduating class of boot campers in an emotional farewell ceremony. As the men and women reflect on their journeys, they must also make a decision about where to take their new relationships now that boot camp is over. Some romances will blossom and some will end for good, but one relationship will take things up a notch - leaving boot camp on the road to marriage with a shiny new diamond ring to seal the deal!

1.title: What Men Really Think
1.plot: Eight women, struggling to find love, arrive at the Tough Love Boot Camp to enlist the aide of mother and son Master Matchmakers, Steve and JoAnn Ward.

2.title: Red Flags and White Lies
2.plot: Steve sends the girls on some shocking dates, literally, as he outfits them with "The Zapper".

3.title: Sex and the Male Brain
3.plot: The girls get a chance to show Steve what they think is sexy when they step in front of the camera for a photo shoot.

4.title: Friends Don't Let Friends Date Bitches
4.plot: The ladies compete in touch football and bar trivia to prove they can be one of the guys.

5.title: Dollars and Sex
5.plot: The girls try to strip away the past as they strip away t-shirts revealing embarrassing facts about themselves.

6.title: Dirty Little Secrets
6.plot: Steve hosts a game show where a male studio audience decides whether or not the girls are "Cute or Crazy".

7.title: Return of the Exes
7.plot: ItâEUR(TM)s visiting day at Boot Camp and Steve invites special guests for each of the girls.

8.title: The Finale
8.plot: The Tough Love Bootcamp is coming to an end for our six remaining girls, but Steve has one last challenge for them, and this time the training wheels are coming off.

1.title: Welcome to Boot Camp
1.plot: Steve Ward is back as 8 brand new Tough Love recruits arrive at Boot Camp in desperate need of Steve?s help.

2.title: Communication
2.plot: The girls go on dates at an amusement park only to find out that Steve has a wet and wild challenge in store for them.

3.title: Sex, Lies and Boot Camp
3.plot: Lingerie, sexy poses and alluring looks are the order of the day, but one bootcamper?s blowup will leave the others shaken.

4.title: Daddy Issues
4.plot: In the most emotional week of Tough Love Boot Camp yet, the girls are forced to look into their pasts and confront lingering issues they have with their fathers.

5.title: The Wow Factor
5.plot: It's the Miss Tough Love Beauty Pageant, where the ladies learn exactly what it takes to make a man go "wow!".

6.title: You Can't Handle the Truth
6.plot: Truth or consequences - the ladies are horrified and outraged when they are put on trial for their scandalous past dating crimes. Cheating, affairs with married men - nothing is held back in the most revealing week in Boot Camp history.

7.title: Money Can't Buy Me Love
7.plot: Steve gives the girls a terrifying glimpse into their future - and what it's like to be single forever. But instead of embracing their transformations, some of the girls lead a Boot Camp revolt.

8.title: Revenge of the Exes
8.plot: In a startling twist of fate, the girls' ex-boyfriends arrive at Tough Love Boot Camp - and they are challenged to confront their pasts before they are able to move forward with the future.

9.title: Ghosts of Dating Future
9.plot: Steve gives the girls a terrifying glimpse into their future - and what it's like to be single forever. But instead of embracing their transformations, some of the girls lead a Boot Camp revolt.

10.title: Away We Go!
10.plot: As the second Tough Love Boot Camp comes to a close, Steve takes the training wheels off and sends the ladies on romantic overnight dates.

11.title: Promises, Promises
11.plot: The ladies of Tough Love 2 conclude their romantic weekend dates and head back to the house for the biggest group ceremony yet, where the remaining women must decide who they will give their promise rings to.

1.title: Welcome to Miami!
1.plot: Steve Ward is back and this time, he's taking his Tough Love Bootcamp on the road...to Miami, one of the hottest dating scenes around! With eight new bootcampers to train for love, Steve has his hands full.

2.title: Dating in the Digital Age
2.plot: Steve puts his bootcamper's texting skills to a secret test and gets some surprising results! Later, the ladies and their dates are ambushed with all the dirty laundry from their online profiles.

3.title: Inner and Outer Beauty
3.plot: Steve's mom, JoAnn, arrives at bootcamp to help him with an early morning raid of the ladies rooms and personal belongings. What she and Steve discover will lead to a dramatic makeover that leaves one bootcamper in tears.

4.title: Flirting
4.plot: Steve challenges the ladies to communicate with their dates non-verbally, using body language to convey their feelings and complete a series of saucy Miami activities.

5.title: Sex and Samba
5.plot: The ladies are challenged to show their sexy side, while dancing the samba in full Brazilian attire: headdresses, sequins and not much else.

6.title: Dealbreakers
6.plot: Steve teaches his bootcampers a tough lesson about dating dealbreakers, their own as well as those of the men they are seeing.

7.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner-His Mom!
7.plot: Bootcamp takes an emotional turn this week when the girls are asked to confront any lingering relationship issues they have with their mothers.

8.title: Secrets and Lies
8.plot: The girls are tested on their moral compass in a revealing game show called "Land O' Lies". When Steve calls on them to reveal the biggest lie they've ever told, a game-changing secret is revealed about one of the ladies.

9.title: Attack of the Exes!
9.plot: The girls are taken aback when their ex-boyfriends begin ringing the doorbell. But what happens when your confrontational past meets your romantic present when the girls' current flames show up for the party?

10.title: Away We Go
10.plot: It's time for our bootcampers to take their fledgling relationship to the next level - in the Bahamas! The girls and their dates board a real life love boat, but some of these relationships may not survive the trip.

11.title: A Promise Worth Keeping
11.plot: It's time for the Promise Ring Ceremony. Each bootcamper must make a personal decision and a promise...to herself, to Steve and especially to her suitor at bootcamp.

12.title: Reunion Special
12.plot: Steve and Joann follow up with the ladies of Tough Love Miami eight months after bootcamp. Lessons have been learned and lives have been changed, but some bootcamp drama won't go away. Presented by VH1.

1.title: Welcome to New Orleans!
1.plot: Steve and Joann Ward are back and they have brought 8 of their toughest cases to New Orleans, home of Mardi Gras, Jazz, and temptation around every corner.

2.title: Is What You See What You Get?
2.plot: From creating alluring online dating profiles to selecting the right pictures to represent themselves, Steve covers every possible pitfall our bootcampers will face with dating in the digital age.

3.title: Return of the Zapper
3.plot: The ladies get a rude awakening when Steve puts them in front of a panel of 25 men to learn what really turns them on...and off!

4.title: Class or Crass?
4.plot: Steve and Joann go undercover and watch the bootcampers uncensored, unfiltered and completely uninhibited! The girls are unleashed on the city of New Orleans for a wild night out that ends up going off the rails.

5.title: Let's Talk About Sex!
5.plot: What will happen when the Tough Love bootcampers host a sex-talk radio show? Steve is shocked to find out how uninhibited the bootcampers can be when it comes to sex - and how conservative one of their own is.

6.title: Can You Laugh at Yourself?
6.plot: The girls are completely taken aback when on their fancy dinner dates, waiters dump food in their laps. Will they be able to handle the shock gracefully? Ruined dresses, tears, and many laughs are shared in this scandalous Tough Love exercise.

7.title: Fish Out of Water
7.plot: Tough Love goes into the swamp this week as the ladies experience the great outdoors with their guys - and - surprise! - their guys' Dads. From crawfishing to hunting swamp rats, who will rough it and who will run for cover?

8.title: Exes
8.plot: It's time for everyone's favorite week at boot camp! The exes show up at the front door and the Tough Love boot campers have to deal with the mistakes and temptations of their pasts in order to move forward.

9.title: Bringing Him Home
9.plot: When Steve decides it's time to take these emerging relationships to the next level, the girls and their dates travel back to their hometowns to meet the parents.

10.title: The Finale
10.plot: As bootcamp comes to an end, the boyfriends return as promises are made, passionate kisses are shared and one girl is shocked to see her man drop to one knee and reveal a shiny ring from his pocket.

imdb.plot outline: A reality-show around a women's love boot-camp is hosted by matchmaker Steve Ward who is the son of successful matchmaker Joann Ward. His brutal honesty makes for an entertaining "tough love" advisory approach to helping these nine love troubled women deal with their issues. Classic character personalities earning titles such as "the gold digger" or "Wedding Obsessed." Watch as they learn how to change themselves in order to better themselves and attract good men. They will participate in dating 101 classes under the male matchmaker. See who has "daddy issues" to overcome. See them go through personal challenges as well as the ones setup for them. Who will leave and who will stay?
imdb.title: Tough Love
plot: A reality-show around a women's love boot-camp is hosted by matchmaker Steve Ward who is the son of successful matchmaker Joann Ward. His brutal honesty makes for an entertaining "tough love" advisory approach to helping these nine love troubled women deal with their issues. Classic character personalities earning titles such as "the gold digger" or "Wedding Obsessed." Watch as they learn how to change themselves in order to better themselves and attract good men. They will participate in dating 101 classes under the male matchmaker. See who has "daddy issues" to overcome. See them go through personal challenges as well as the ones setup for them. Who will leave and who will stay?::monnie101
